record.dc:title: 202BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 6BN147, juvenile male(?) in fair condition, semi-partly flexed on left side with head to the east. Stone on left hip. Square 48R1. Direction South.
record.wpa:narrative: Rather loosely flexed individual. No pit evidences.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has small illustration of burial on file.
